title: Can we talk about Mafia Miss Fortune's awkwardly placed hat?

replies.body: I think it looks fine, in-game anyway... The model viewer look that you have there looks so bad for everything.

> [{quoted}](name=Raleko,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aFqYyQKF,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-18T18:02:19.193+0000)
>
> http://imgur.com/GE5CqRP

it's not awkward if you look at it from the in-game pre-set angle.

model viewer makes many things awkward because the models are designed for the game not for a straight-on view.

even if you aren't seeing it from this angle in game, i don't see why it couldn't be adjusted so it looks like it sits on her head properly with the model viewer. that's at least my understanding of the point of the op
The hat looks like someone just copied and pasted a random hat off of Google. The hat looks incredibly flat at that angle.
I think we can all agree that Miss Fortune desperately needs a visual overhaul to deal with her obscenely campy, oversized guns and her tentacle hair gone wild, among other things.
If it was tilted it wouldn't look too bad. But it's not so it looks really weird.
Hahaha that model viewer, some are really buggy, regardless of company.
I get that it's old, but at what point did any employee of Riot look at this and say, yeah this looks like a fair finished product.

i think we all know that MF's hats look strange. literally all of them (i'm looking at you candy cane MF) but the real problem isnt even the hats, its her massive and weird looking hair that makes the hats have to be huge and oddly shaped.
It doesn't really look bad in game, the model viewer is of sometimes.
Keep in mind, not all models are made 100% accurate to what you might think, because in game you are viewing it at a set angle, not head on like this screen shot.
This skin is horrible anyway. Wondering who made it...
